extDescription.message: Let you bookmark fb posts like chrome bookmarks, never forget any fb post you want to find

addBookmarkTooltip.description: tooltip displayed when the stat of the post hovered is not bookmarked.

removeBookmarkTooltip.description: tooltip displayed when the stat of the post hovered was bookmarked.

hintWhenNameEmpty.message: Please specify a name for this bookmark!
hintWhenNameEmpty.description: hint displayed on text input when name is not given

nameTextInputLabel.description: the label of input[type=text] of modal

nameTextInputPlaceholder.description: the placeholder of input[type=text] of modal

folderSelectLabel.description: the label of select of modal
